title: Big Zuu and AJ Tracey's Rich Flavours
overview: BAFTA award-winning TV chef Big Zuu is teaming up with his cousin and multi-platinum selling rapper AJ Tracey, for a global culinary experience like no other in Sky Max's new original series Big Zuu & AJ Tracey's Seriously Rich Flavours, set to air in spring 2025.This three-part series takes viewers on an exciting journey to explore the world's most expensive and outrageous dishes. But the dynamic duo won't just be sampling the food â€“ they'll be immersing themselves in the culture, customs and stories surrounding these unique dining experiences, offering a glimpse into the world of ludicrous luxury. Travelling across East Asia, North America and Europe, this extravagant culinary investigation sees Big Zuu and AJ Tracey uncover the places and people behind these premium plates.
